features: Reliable Wireless Connection🎤 With a remarkable operating range of 200ft, BXTYVZAU wireless microphone system provides you with the freedom to move around the stage or venue without compromising on audio quality or signal stability.

High-Quality Sound🎤 With advanced UHF technology, the BXTYVZAU Cordless Microphones delivers crystal-clear sound and excellent signal strength, ensuring clear and precise audio reproduction for your audience. Deliver clear, robust, pure, full, optimal true sound. Ideal for Karaoke, Home KTV, Big party, DJ, Wedding, Class use.

Wide Compatibility🎤 Designed with versatility in mind, the BXTYVZAU wireless UHF handheld microphone system is compatible with a wide range of devices and audio setups, making it perfect for singers, presenters, musicians, and public speakers.

Enhanced Performance🎤 Equipped with 2x48 channels, allowing up to 48 units to be used simultaneously without any radio interference, the BXTYVZAU Dynamic Microphones ensures smooth, interference-free transmissions, allowing you to deliver outstanding performances without any disruptions or dropouts.

Portable & Convenient🎤 This portable microphone is designed for easy handling and transportation, allowing you to effortlessly bring it to events, concerts, conferences, and more. It is perfect for anyone in need of a reliable Wireless audio device. ❗If you have any questions, feel free to contact us anytime : )

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Immersive Enjoyment with BXTYVZU Wireless Microphones
BXTYVZU Handheld Dynamic Microphones Support Multiple Media Devices

Multiple application scenarios Singing and Karaoke Elevate your singing performances and karaoke nights with studio-grade sound, allowing you to move and express yourself without the constraints of wires. Public Speaking and Workshops Facilitate dynamic workshops and inspire your audience with clear, uninterrupted audio, fostering an interactive and engaging learning environment. For Weeding Capture every vow clearly with our wireless microphone, ensuring seamless communication and mobility for a memorable wedding experience. Live Performances Shine on stage with our wireless microphone, delivering your talent flawlessly to the audience while enjoying freedom of movement and exceptional sound quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality & Price
reviews.reviewText: These have worked great at my recent gatherings of friends and family. I've tried it out at home for karaoke first. Then, have been using it mainly while out camping with the crew. This has nice range and sounds great. It also isn't hard to setup. I'd recommend you give this a try since you'll definitely get your money's worth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super dual microphone. Great quality and sounds good`
reviews.reviewText: I was super impressed by this DUAL wireless mic. It has both a mixed 1/4 inch output or you can use separate XLR outputs for each channel. It auto syncs the handheld to the receiver unit. I just put in 2 aa batteries and it was ready to go. My first mic goes from from 635.1 to 658.6 mHz in .5 mHz steps. The second mic goes from 659.1 to 682.6. So there is no way that you will overlap channels with this system. Very nice feature. The power / mute button is near the bottom of the handheld mic so users won't accidentally hit it while picking up the mic or while using it. A push of the channel button inside the battery cover of the mic lets you jump to other channels and it auto syncs with the base unit. I went over 80 ft away and it sounded great. The box mentions 520 - 980 mHz range, so your setup may be in different range. This is a GREAT wireless microphone setup for this price. Great for a mobile Karaoke setup or presentation where you need 2 microphones. Highly recommended !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024

reviews.reviewText: The microphone are really great easy to use and so useful for karaoke.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to use
reviews.reviewText: We got the unit for the speeches at a wedding reception and it worked great. We didn't have any issues getting the mics to connect and the audio was clear at 25-30ft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a microphone for monthly company meetings and this has worked out perfectly for our monthly meeting and company party. It was easy to set up and use. The batteries are easy to change and the on/off button is well placed. The sound quality is good. This was exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I liked the sound quality of the microphone and it is very convenient. I really loved it👍👍👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like that the mic on/off button is on the very bottom side -see in photo. (instead of on the hand held part-which often means people turn the mic off by mistake while holding it). Picture shows the cable ports on the back side, and other photo shows instructions. Mic's require batteries (2 AA)Works exactly as expected, great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality - avoid this wireless system
reviews.reviewText: This wireless system operates within the 659.1 - 682.6MHz frequency range, which is restricted by the FCC for civilian use in the United States. Second, the receiver is extremely light weight and overall, just feels very cheap. The weight and feel of the microphones actually seem okay, but the receiver almost feels hallow. Third, the unit is extremely quiet. To have decent volume levels, you have almost yell into the microphone with the volume on the receiver maxed out. Even with a high quality speaker/pre-amp, you will struggle to get decent levels out of this system. Because of these issues, I didn’t even bother with a detailed audio quality test because it wouldn’t matter – the product can’t practically be used, nor should it be used due to the frequency range it operates in.
